author-notes.corresp: Address correspondence to Fengming Huang, hfmyykejian@163.com, Ningyi Jin, ningyik@126.com, or Chengyu Jiang, jiang@pumc.edu.cn.

fn.p: Cong Zhang and Yuqing Zhang contributed equally to this article.

Citation Zhang C, Zhang Y, Qin Y, Zhang Q, Liu Q, Shang D, Lu H, Li X, Zhou C, Huang F, Jin N, Jiang C. 2019. Ifenprodil and flavopiridol identified by genomewide RNA interference screening as effective drugs to ameliorate murine acute lung injury after influenza A H5N1 virus infection. mSystems 4:e00431-19. https://doi.org/10.1128/mSystems.00431-19.
